resources.string:
Hi, My name is Mike. 

I love traveling 

The kind of traveling where you learn a lot about others cultures and you star to make good friends from another countries. 

I had travel to another country once in my life and this experience mark me for my whole life. 

In that experience i med a lot a people from different countries like Americans, Romanians, Bulgarians, Mexicans, colombians and philippines. 

I mark my life so much that I want to spend my whole life traveling and knowing the world. 

One of the more exiting experiences was the SkyDiving, my travel was for spend 4 months at the grand Canyon and I jump from a plane over there. 

The view of the grand canyon by the sky is one of the most beautiful view in the world. 

And I can't describe how scary is the SkyDiving before jump. 

 but after jump you lose the fear and you just enjoy the wind and the view in the sky.
